name: The Caverns
description:
An employee at the roadside tourist attraction “The Caverns” falls asleep after closing down the gift shop. Explore their dreams and find the six gifts in order to wake up again.

The Arrow Keys - Movement

The Shift Key - Return to The Center

The Enter Key - “POV”

Refresh the page to start over from the beginning.

Game #1 in The Night Shift Anthology. May be updated with more at a later date.

Billboard Stock Photo by DesignClass
